DOC.detailed_description: Dually diagnose Veterans ( N = 178 ) recruit Charleston , SC VAMC Outpatient Substance Abuse Treatment Center ( SATC ) block randomize TAU , GMI , IHMD . Patients alcohol dependence abuse ( include drug abuse ) nonsubstance-related major Axis I disorder ( e.g. , bipolar disorder , depression , psychotic disorder ) eligible study . Participants , refer study time triage orientation phase SATC , evaluate baseline approximately 1 3-month follow-up . Primary outcome measure alcohol use treatment utilization measure number day alcohol use , number binge alcohol drinking day , quantity alcohol consume ( standard drink , SECs ) , treatment attendance session base objective CPRS patient medical record ( i.e. , number substance abuse outpatient , mental health [ e.g. , PTSD , depression ] , substance abuse treatment session ) , self-reported 12-step ( number self-help AA/NA ) session , include day consult 12-step mutual self-help sponsor . Exploratory outcomes measure include number illicit drug use day ( e.g. , cocaine , crack , marijuana , opiates , sedative ) . Primary question : A .
